title: Vehicular Pollution as Primary Source of Oxidative Potential of PM2.5 in Bhubaneswar, a non-attainment city in eastern India
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00150H, Paper
Subhasmita Panda, Chinmay Mallik, S Suresh Babu, Sudhir Kumar Sharma, Tuhin Kumar Mandal, Trupti Das, Boopathy R
We assessed the oxidative potential (OP) of PM2.5 (n = 230) using dithiothreitol (DTT) assay to identify the emission sources in Bhubaneswar (20.20°N, 85.80°E), one of the non-attainment cities under...
